title: [Large-Scale] Educational Design Competency Enhancement Project for Online High School Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental curriculum design concepts and online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Online instructional design competency development process using Delphi technique in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, with summative evaluation through actual online lecture revision projects

learning_goals: Learners can derive the top five priority competencies for online high school instructional design using the Delphi technique.
Learners can modify the three components (objectives, activities, assessments) of existing online lecture materials using smartphone-based tools.
Learners can achieve at least 80% feasibility in implementing their final designed curriculum through peer feedback and expert validation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
